data.name: ReadCodeValue
data.value: select top(1) T1.COV_ID, T1.COD_ID, T1.CDVALUE, T1.EFFECTIVE_DATE, T1.EXPIRATION_DATE from CKT_CODE T2 join CKT_CODE_VALUE T1 on (T1.CDVALUE = @cdvalue) and (T2.COD_ID = T1.COD_ID) and (T2.CODE_NAME = @codeName) and (T1.EFFECTIVE_DATE <= @effectiveDate) and (T1.EXPIRATION_DATE > @effectiveDate)
